Our parent company (**LFC Hosting**) has been offering shared hosting and co-location since 1996; however, we began offering VPS services late last year.

**LFC-128 ($3/month):**
- Xen-PV w/ SolusVM
- 128 MB RAM / 256 MB Swap
- 10 GB disk space
- 200 GB bandwidth
- 1 CPU core
- 1 IPv4 Address
- 10 IPv6 Addresses (upon request)

**Use the code "LET128" when you order [here](http://www.lfcvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=29)! Visa/Mastercard or Paypal are accepted!**

**LFC-256 ($6.46/month):**
- Xen-PV w/ SolusVM
- 256 MB RAM / 256 MB Swap
- 20 GB disk space
- 300 GB bandwidth
- 2 CPU cores
- 1 IPv4 Address
- 10 IPv6 Addresses (upon request)

**Use the code "35OFF" when you order [here](http://www.lfcvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3)! This code also works on any of our other plans (except the LFC-128)**

- **8 x Seagate 15,000RPM 600GB SAS Hard Drives (RAID-10)**
